vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.11.20;
son of: Reu (H7466);
father of: Nahor (H5152)
Also named: Sarouch<\i> (Σαρούχ "Serug" G4562)
§ Serug = "branch"
son of Reu and great grandfather of Abraham
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Reú; descendiente de Sem
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
西鹿 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "分支"
亞伯拉罕的曾祖父
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
西鹿 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "分支"
亚伯拉罕的曾祖父
